name: Polska Organizacja Przemys≈Çu i Handlu Naftowego
goal: One of the most important objectives of POPiHN is to ensure balanced development of the competitive fuel market in Poland by inter alia acting towards introduction of business principles in keeping with the EU legislation and equal treatment of all Polish fuel market players. POPiHN has been focusing on coordinating cooperation between member companies to facilitate the highest product and service quality in order to create a positive public image of member companies by coordinating and supporting responsible business activities. POPiHN is also looking towards initiatives to reduce underground economy in the fuel market in Poland.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Taxation, excise tax, EMCS, FWD, FQD, RED, ETD, Common Nomenclature, Custom rules, Fiscalis, Fuels and lubricants quality
